altTitles.th: นางร้ายขอเป็นที่รัก

description.en:
Athanasia Cloix, a woman whose elegance and beauty is akin to that of a swan lake, was the Duke’s eldest daughter and the Queen of the social circles: an existence near to perfection. Due to some rumors, however, people began to misunderstand and belittle her. As she suffered through these unfortunate events, she learned to conceal her feelings by putting on a façade and agreed to a political marriage with the Winter-comer who's also known as the “Northern Monster.”

"As the Grand Duke, I will do my best to accommodate your needs and desires. But love alone is something I can't give to you." Unbeknownst to her, that very man will change her life and thus a new fate is about to unfold.

---
*Note: Based on the [Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=50467381) by Korean author Nunoiz, the webcomic is drawn by a Chinese artist and was first released in Chinese and later in Korean.*

**Original Webcomic:** [AC.QQ](https://ac.qq.com/Comic/comicInfo/id/643427), [BiliBili](https://manga.bilibili.com/detail/mc26945), [Dongman](https://www.dongmanmanhua.cn/LOVE/envhuigaibian/list?title_no=1625), [IQIYI](https://www.iqiyi.com/manhua/detail_18yzrjuq5x.html), [KuaiKan](https://www.kuaikanmanhua.com/web/topic/4730/), [ManmanAPP](https://www.manmanapp.com/comic-1404814.html), [Mkzhan](https://www.mkzhan.com/214726/), [Zymk](https://www.zymk.cn/4090/)

**Official Translations:**
* [English](https://www.tappytoon.com/en/comics/a-villainess-no-more)
* [French / Français](https://delitoon.com/webtoon/lady-evil)
* [Indonesian / Bahasa Indonesia](https://kakaopage.co.id/content/The-Evil-Lady-Will-Change/3325)
* [Japanese / 日本語](https://piccoma.com/web/product/32421)
* Korean / 한국어: [Daum](https://webtoon.kakao.com/content/%EC%95%85%EB%85%80%EB%8A%94-%EB%B3%80%ED%99%94%ED%95%9C%EB%8B%A4/2800), [KakaoPage](https://page.kakao.com/home/53903018)
* [Thai / ภาษาไทย](https://www.comico.in.th/titles/1860)
* [Vietnamese / Tiếng Việt](https://www.comico.vn/title/376)
description.fr:
Pour assurer la prospérité de sa famille et de son pays, elle a accepté d’épouser la terrifiante «Bête du Nord.» Contre toute attente, son futur époux n’est pas le monstre dépeint par les rumeurs. Au contraire, il semble être un fiancé attentionné. Mais il la prévient: il ne l’aime pas et ne l’aimera jamais. Ça tombe bien, parce que s’il y a bien une chose en laquelle Lady Evil de ne croit pas, c’est l’amour…

---

description.id:
Eljanes Crocus terkenal dengan julukan 'Perempuan Jahat' karena semua orang menganggap dia lebih memilih keluarga bangsawan daripada rakyat. Hanya saja, mereka tidak tahu tujuan di balik perbuatannya itu. Mereka juga tidak tahu dirinya yang sebenarnya baik hati dan tidak sungkan menolong orang lain. Pada suatu hari, dia membatalkan pertunangannya untuk menggantikan adiknya menikah dengan Lucarn memiliki julukan 'Monster Utara'. Sebelum menikah, mereka saling menyatakan untuk tidak berharap adanya cinta dalam pernikahan. Apa yang akan terjadi pada kehidupan pernikahan mereka? Dan siapakah yang akan jatuh cinta duluan?

description.ja:
金と権力に目がなく、ロベリアの『悪女』と呼ばれているエルザネス。
『聖女』と崇拝される妹リリエル‎の代わりに、
北方の『怪物』と呼ばれるウィンターナイト大公と政略結婚をすることになり、
一人静かにアマリリス帝国に向かう――。
大公に手厚く迎えられるが、愛を求めないことを望む二人は、
忠実な結婚生活を遂行することを約束するのだが……!?

---

description.ko:
로벨리아의 성녀는 빛났다.
악녀를 향한 비난만큼이나.

하지만 악녀가 떠난 후 사람들은 의구심을 품었다.
진정 빛났던 건 누구인가?

모두가 한입으로 '찬탄'한 최고의 한쌍.
<남쪽의 악녀>와 <북쪽의 괴물>.

상처 입은 두 사람이
함께 사랑을 알아가는 이야기.

"악녀는 변화한다"

---

description.ru:
Айшанас Клокс – старшая дочь герцога, любимица общества, но вследствие необоснованных слухов люди считают ее «холодной» и «завистливой». Именно поэтому она решает скрывать от других свои истинные чувства. Вскоре она соглашается на политический брак с герцогом Винтенетом, известным как Северное Чудовище. Но она и представить себе не может, как этот мужчина изменит ее жизнь.

---

description.th:
แอลเจนิส เลดี้ผู้สง่างามและเพียบพร้อม แต่กลับถูกกล่าวขานว่าเป็นนางร้ายแห่งโรเบลเรีย ซึ่งต่างจากน้องสาวของนางที่ทุกคนต่างรักและเอ็นดู...

---

description.vi:
Nhà Công tước Crocus của vương quốc Lobelia nổi tiếng với hai vị tiểu thư vô cùng khác biệt. Trái ngược với cô em gái Ririere đáng yêu, hoạt bát và được ca tụng là "Thánh nữ" thì Elsaness lại bị người đời gán cho biệt danh "Ác nữ xứ Lobelia" bởi tính cách lạnh lùng và khuôn mặt luôn thờ ơ của mình. Khi được Đại công tước Winternight cầu hôn, Elsaness đành phải tới Amaryllis thay em gái trở thành vợ của "Quái vật phương Bắc". Nhưng cô không ngờ chuyến đi này sẽ thay đổi số phận của cả hai người!

---
*Note: Based on the [Original Novel](https://page.kakao.com/home?seriesId=50467381) by Korean author Nunoiz, the webcomic is drawn by a Chinese artist and was first released in Chinese and later in Korean.*

description.zh:
艾莎纳斯·克罗克斯，如天鹅般优雅美丽的女人，公爵的长女，却因为一些毫无根据的谣言被人们误解，人民口中的她“冷漠、善妒”。这一切发生后，她将真实的自己隐藏了起来，同意与被称为“北方怪物”的温特内特大公举行政治联姻。但她不知道的是，眼前这个男人将给她带来很大的改变，她的新生活也将就此展开

---
